io.dazraf.vertx.futures

Interface Futures<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<T>, io.vertx.core.Future<T>

    public interface Futures<T>
extends io.vertx.core.Future<T>
    An interface for chaining Futures
